title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 August 2008 - XWiki
content:
daning - (24/08/2008 17:40): vmassol\_: Hi.  
daning - (24/08/2008 17:41): vmassol\_: The Beijing Olympic Games closing ceremony was just end. And I am working on the new interface of office converter and ConverterOutput.  
vmassol\_ - (24/08/2008 18:18): daning: hi  
vmassol\_ - (24/08/2008 18:18): daning: ok  
daning - (24/08/2008 18:21): vmassol\_: I have something to say.  
daning - (24/08/2008 18:22): vmassol\_: Today the my new term will begin. And I have to stay in the lab from 8 am to 6 pm.   
daning - (24/08/2008 18:23): vmassol\_: I only can work on xwiki project from 7 pm to next day 1 am. Is that OK?  
vmassol\_ - (24/08/2008 18:25): daning: sure, it's up to you what you can contribute  
daning - (24/08/2008 18:26): vmassol\_: Is anything you think is out of track, please tell me as soon as possible. I will improve it as I can.  
vmassol\_ - (24/08/2008 18:26): daning: ok will try  
xwikibot - (24/08/2008 18:50): Macros.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jvizueta - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/  
xwikibot - (24/08/2008 18:50): Macros.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jvizueta - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/  
xwikibot - (24/08/2008 18:56): Macros.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Rollback to version 15.1) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/  
xwikibot - (24/08/2008 18:57): Macros.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added wanted macro from jvizueta (I had to rollback since he changed the layout!)) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/  
daning - (24/08/2008 19:05): vmassol\_: Hi. I want to get the xwiki temp directory to handle the output dir of conversion. But I think can't get the xwiki temp without a xwik context. Maybe the interface should change to     void convert(InputStream sourceData, OfficeDocumentType sourceType, ConverterOutput outputData,  
daning - (24/08/2008 19:05):         OfficeDocumentType outputType, XWikiContext context) throws OfficeConverterException; WDYT?  
daning - (24/08/2008 19:18): Have to go. I send mails to list. bye.  
xwikibot - (24/08/2008 20:05): Community.DevelopmentPractices was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DevelopmentPractices  
xwikibot - (24/08/2008 20:06): Community.DevelopmentPractices was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DevelopmentPractices
